name: restifiedts
description: RestifiedTS is a powerful, lightweight, and fully extensible API automation framework built in TypeScript, designed as a battle-ready alternative to Java's RestAssured â€” but with modern capabilities tailored for JavaScript/Node.js ecosystems.

scripts.test: npm run test:clean && npm run test:all:json && npm run test:merge:all
scripts.test:unit: npm run test:clean && npm run test:unit:json && npm run test:merge:unit
scripts.test:integration: npm run test:clean && npm run test:integration:json && npm run test:merge:integration
scripts.test:smoke: npm run test:clean && npm run test:smoke:json && npm run test:merge:smoke
scripts.test:regression: npm run test:clean && npm run test:regression:json && npm run test:merge:regression
scripts.test:systems: npm run test:clean && npm run test:logging:json && npm run test:storage:json && npm run test:database:json && npm run test:merge:systems
scripts.test:merge:all: mochawesome-merge reports/mochawesome-all.json -o reports/all-consolidated.json && marge reports/all-consolidated.json --reportDir reports --reportFilename all-test-report --inline
scripts.test:merge:unit: mochawesome-merge reports/mochawesome-unit.json -o reports/unit-consolidated.json && marge reports/unit-consolidated.json --reportDir reports --reportFilename unit-test-report --inline
scripts.test:merge:integration: mochawesome-merge reports/mochawesome-integration.json -o reports/integration-consolidated.json && marge reports/integration-consolidated.json --reportDir reports --reportFilename integration-test-report --inline
scripts.test:merge:smoke: mochawesome-merge reports/mochawesome-smoke.json -o reports/smoke-consolidated.json && marge reports/smoke-consolidated.json --reportDir reports --reportFilename smoke-test-report --inline
scripts.test:merge:regression: mochawesome-merge reports/mochawesome-regression.json -o reports/regression-consolidated.json && marge reports/regression-consolidated.json --reportDir reports --reportFilename regression-test-report --inline
scripts.test:merge:systems: mochawesome-merge reports/mochawesome-logging.json reports/mochawesome-storage.json reports/mochawesome-database.json -o reports/systems-consolidated.json && marge reports/systems-consolidated.json --reportDir reports --reportFilename systems-test-report --inline
scripts.test:comprehensive: npm run test:systems && npm run test:unit && npm run test:integration && npm run test:smoke && npm run test:regression && npm run test:merge:comprehensive
scripts.test:merge:comprehensive: mochawesome-merge reports/systems-consolidated.json reports/unit-consolidated.json reports/integration-consolidated.json reports/smoke-consolidated.json reports/regression-consolidated.json -o reports/comprehensive-consolidated.json && marge reports/comprehensive-consolidated.json --reportDir reports --reportFilename comprehensive-test-report --inline
scripts.prepublishOnly: npm run clean && npm run build
scripts.test:report: npm run test:smoke:json && npm run test:restified:json && npm run report:merge
scripts.report:merge: mochawesome-merge reports/mochawesome-*.json > reports/mochawesome-merged.json && mochawesome-report-generator reports/mochawesome-merged.json --reportDir reports --reportFilename RestifiedTS-Consolidated-Report --inline

author: Raj Kumar
